title: Game freezes for a few seconds then everything happens at once
body: Ok So this happened a few months ago and it wasn't very bad then just stopped, but now it's making league unplayable. In game My ping and fps stay the same but out of no where and for no reason it seems, my sound stops working and the game essentially freezes, i can walk around and use abilities but i cant see the abilties activate and monster/s creeps and what not will run out of hp and the bar will disappear but the monster stays and keeps fighting and creep keep swinging. Then after a few second (between 2 and 10) everything that has happened in that gap will happen on screen in lightspeed. So what happens most times is right when i get to a spot and move around then the freeze happens and when it snaps back the enemy team is killing/killed me. I really dont know what this is but i need help!

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a connection, causing communication with the server to throttle and delay.  I recommend going over our[ connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up for good.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
